John Legend attends the 2017 Billboard Music Awards at T-Mobile Arena on May 21, 2017 in Las Vegas.

John Legend attends the 2017 Billboard Music Awards at T-Mobile Arena on May 21, 2017 in Las Vegas. Gustavo Caballero/BBMA2017/Getty Images for DCP

Photos from the 2017 Billboard Music Awards red carpet on May 21 in Las Vegas.
